reviewText:
This is verified on the single can.

First off, I did not receive a discount, paid full price and actually have a beard. With that out of the way, this stuff is what I've been searching for for a very long time. I almost didn't purchase it as I have spent a small fortune and resigned myself to the belief that what I'm after doesn't exist. Thankfully it does and this is it!

I have tried so many beard waxes and all have left something to be desired. I have been searching for a beard wax that was as firm as possible while still actually being useable in the beard. What I found were ones with either laughable hold or were so firm that they were unusable in the beard and should only be considered a stache wax. I have also found a couple that are pretty good though the hold doesn't last for more than an hour or so.

In comes The Bearded Goon's Ridiculously Strong Beard and Mustache Wax which has an incredibly firm hold. So firm that this is one step away from being solely a stache style wax. And, it's still useable in the beard. It takes a little effort scrapping it out with a thumbnail but still doable. A little hand rub heat makes it ready for beard application. Hitting it with a blow dryer makes this process even easier, if you have the time for that. I recommend having your beard damp with hot water, this seems to help with application and styling also.

Here's the best part, it lasts, all day! Hell your beard actually still looks good in the morning or just needs a little hand smoothing. This goes for maintenance also. If it does get a bit messed up just a quick smooth puts it right back. It also washes out just fine and smells great too. It has a very subtle clean scent that fades pretty quick, this is good.

This is a real beard wax folks with all natural, quality ingredients. No chemical crap here. You can't get any better, useably stronger or longer lasting than this and trust me I've looked. This is also not a balm or an oil, if you want a conditioning product buy one of those. This is a strong hold wax, and very good at its job! Very well done and thank you for this outstanding product!

let's just make it 2 ounces guys!
Good
This is NOT in anyway shape or form a ridiculously strong mustache wax, it's cheap and s***ty crap, don't buy it.
description: Brand New
title: The Bearded Goon's RIDICULOUSLY STRONG Beard & Handlebar Moustache Wax (2 Tins) - Strongest Hold for Mustache, Beards, and Facial Hair - 1oz (30ml) each

reviewText: I purchased the 7845XL razor in March 04.  I have used it almost everyday since (now June 04).  I get a close shave, much better than from my old school electric razor.  The floating heads contour really well to my face, and I have experienced very little discomfort in shaving.  The pop-up trimmer is handy too.  It is amazing how long the battery lasts between charges.  I estimate I get about 18 days between charges.  There is an indicator on the handle that will signal a charge is needed.  Cleaning the blades as described in the owner's manual is a good idea.  Why did I pick this razor?  It was in my price range.  A friend at work liked his Norelco.  The color was acceptable.  At the time of purchase, there was a special offer that was appealing to me.

I have had this razor for about 6 years now.  I use it daily and the original battery is still running strong.  I have never replaced the blades and that time has come as now I see the shave is not as close or quick.  I love the shave this razor gives and the battery life is phenomenal.  The pop-up trimmer is useful for sideburns as well.

I just received my Norelco 7845XL.  I can't believe how close this shaves.  THROW AWAY THE BRAUNS AND ANY OTHER FOIL SHAVERS!

I started shaving with a Norelco. The 710RL was my first and it must have lasted for ten years when it finally stopped.  Then I heard how much closer the Braun foil shaved.  It did!  But it was slower to cover all the areas of your face.  Well, I've had three within the last five years upgrading each time.  My last the 3612 just went haywire and stopped charging.  I should of known better.  It's made in China.

NOW FOR THE NORELCO QUADRA! THIS IS NOT LIKE MY OLD NORELCO.

I HAVE NEVER HAD A SHAVE THIS CLOSE!!!  THIS FAST!!!  THIS QUIET!!!  PERIOD!!!

THE FLOATING HEADS AND REFLEX ACTION IN COMBINATION WITH THE HOLES AND THE SLOTS WORK.  IT GLIDES ALONG YOUR FACE WITH HARDLY PRESSING AGAINST YOUR SKIN.  IT RINSES UNDER HOT WATER.  THE 7845XL HAS TWO LED LIGHTS ONE THAT BLINKS GREEN WHEN THE CHARGE IS FULL AND ONE THAT LIGHTS UP RED WHEN THE CHARGE IS LOW.  THERE ARE THREE OF THESE QUADRAS. THIS ONE IS IN THE MIDDLE.  BUT THEY ARE ALL THE SAME RAZOR EXCEPT FOR THE LED FEATURES.  MAKE SURE YOUR CHARGE THE FIRST TIME FOR FOUR HOURS. IT HAS A 60 DAY MONEY BACK GUARANTEE AND A TWO YEAR WARRANTY. MADE IN HOLLAND THIS SHAVER EVEN LOOKS AND FEELS LIKE A QUALITY PRODUCT.  I BOUGHT MINE FROM DRUGSTORE.COM WITH FREE 3 DAY SHIPPING AND GOT IT IN TWO.

LOOK NO FURTHER THIS IS IT!!!  NORELCO, I'M BACK FOR GOOD!
description:
Norelco's Quadra Action Shaving System, Two Stage Cutting Action, slots cut the long hairs, holes shave the stubble for a closer, more comfortable shave.
Designed for corded or cordless shaving, the Norelco Quadra Action shaver delivers a super-smooth shave along with a bumper crop of handy features. The shaver’s Lift and Cut shaving system uses 45 lifters and 45 rotating blades, so hair actually gets cut below the skin surface. A flexible surface and individually floating heads ensure that the shaver hugs your face’s contours and tackles both long and short stubble comfortably. The shaver also comes with a full-width pop-up trimmer to keep sideburns and moustaches looking sharp.
Built with a pop-up hair chamber, the shaver washes up easily under the faucet and comes with automatic worldwide voltage for simplified travel. Charge time is speedy--just one hour of charging delivers 45 minutes of shave time, and a 6-minute quick charge takes care of emergencies. The nonslip grip is comfortable to hold, and the LED indicators let you know at a glance if charging’s finished or the battery juice is running low. Norelco also includes a storage pouch, cleaning brush, protective cap, and 2-year warranty. --Emily Bedard
title: Norelco Mens Electric Razor - 7845XL

I can't get enough of this stuff. I'm in the Navy. While I was on my last deployment, my mom started sending me these in care packages so I could drink them instead of gatorade, which she hates because of all the chemicals. I would drink a packet in the morning before heading up to the flight deck and usually one at the end of the night after sweating all day. These things probably saved my life and kept me from becoming dehydrated or sick in the heat of the Gulf of Oman and under high stress conditions. Now that I'm back, I still use them. I'm a distance runner and drink one usually every day to keep me hydrated for my long runs. If you don't like the taste, you can mix them into your water with Mio or Dasani Water Enhancers or something similar. Love them!

reviewText: SO GOOD! I'm so happy I bought this. For a costume wig it's amazing quality for the price. This is a great addition to my collection. And it looks just like the photos! That's so hard to come by with this website. If it's still out of stock, do what I did and purchase it from their UK Amazon account! Don't miss out on this, seriously.

It's a damn good wig for what it costs. I'm so glad my friend recommended X&Y Angel to me. It looks and feels pretty real, especially after washing it one time with my wig shampoo & conditioner. It doesn't shed too much, and the blonde color is exactly what I expected. And it shipped pretty quickly. I had it in a little over a week. I alternate between this one and my black & burgundy one regularly, and I'm really happy with it.

I have ordered wigs from this company before and I will say they are a great value, very high quality for the price and they fit my enormous head for the most part which is hard to find.

HOWEVER
I can't stand that they say the package has shipped almost immediately but they don't actually get it to the post office for weeks! Once again I needed a wig before an event and I assumed since they gave me a tracking number and said it had shipped that it would be here soon. But no, they don't actually send it out for weeks. It drives me crazy because I have the tracking number but never any information. I will say that once the wigs get to the post office they get here quickly, they just need to get it to the post office faster. Last time they told me to ignore the amazon arrival date because it would get here long before that. Well, I waited for a month or so and finally on the second day of the amazon arrival date they finally took it to the post office.

Other than that great place to buy wigs, just hope you're not in a rush cause their logistics kinda suck

reviewText: Works well for safety but you can only get a a small size sip of fluid.

Close to worthless. Does release a small amount of fluid but then promotes continued straining to get a little more. Requires that the user stop sipping and then wait for the barrel to refill. Worse there is a lightly fitting rubber plug on the bottom and a small plastic piston that regulates the process. Both come out for cleaning and are extremely easy to loose. Poor design.
This is very helpful as it controls the amount of fluid that can go in mouth with each sip.
description: The SafeStraw provides a limited bolus size by use of a fluid chamber, one way valve, and float. As the patient sucks on the straw, fluid flows through the valve and into the chamber. When the fluid travels through the chamber to the straw, the float rises. After around 6.2mls the float reaches the top of the chamber closing it off preventing the patient from receiving more fluid. Once they stop sucking, the float sinks to the bottom of the chamber. This break gives them time to control the liquid bolus and safely swallow. Once the float has reached the bottom of the chamber they can safely draw another 6.2mls of fluid. Any standard " drinking straw (not included) will fit the tapered end of the SafeStraw device.If straw is too long, simply cut to desired length
title: SafeStraw Drinking Aid for Dysphagia - Thin Fluids

reviewText:
Hey I was going to add a video review but then this might turn into a porn site!!! Hahahaha.

Anyways I actually like the 2030 ten times better than the 2020 because first of all, it looks so freakin cool!!! Thanks to the designer guy that said hey why don't we use this big plastic base to store the accesories, give that guy a raise!!! I always lost my accessories with the 2020. I purchased 3 of these. 1 for me and 2 as gifts, yeah cuz I only give a gift I would buy for myself. I agree with Orion, having an optional foil head without the 2 trimmers on it would make it even easier to trim the sack. Hopefully Philips Norelco reads these reviews & gives us the option to purchase that.

I purchased the BG2030 to replace my previous BodyGroomer that had died - the button no longer 'clicked' the machine on - based on previous reviews. When I received the machine I was impressed by how far Philips has evolved the BodyGroomer, and in contrast to other reviewers found the new trimming head and combs to be a welcome change. Not only are the combs more easily adjustable than the previous model and thus more accurate, but with one for 'sensitive' areas and the other for everything else it aides in maintaining high hygiene of the attachments. The only minor difficulty I had was with the charge light that did not function on my unit which Philips has agreed to replace - this did not affect the operation of the machine, but the CSR felt returning it was the appropriate way to handle the issue.

Overall I would recommend the BG2030 for any 'man-scaping' that you need to do, only cautioning that if you need a truly bare result that you will have to use an additional razor to achieve the desired result. If well kept with a little stubble is all you are looking for then this machine will do the job and then some.

I purchased this trimmer for trimming my underarms and more personal areas along with my beard.  it is amazing.  it is so gentle on the tender areas and has great comb control for my beard.  I have purchased several other trimmers over the years but this one surpasses them all.  It is a bit more pricey than some trimmers but it is worth it.
description:
The all-over Bodygrooming system, with specific trimming and shaving attachments, optimized for sensitive bodyzones
Trim and shave all of your body zones safely and comfortably with the Philips Norelco Professional BodyGrooming System. This five-piece all-over system provides a perfect trim and smooth shave, even in extra-sensitive body zones. Rechargeable and cordless, this efficient system also comes with uniquely designed attachments, including an Extra Sensitive (XS) trimming comb, Extra Large (XL) trimming comb, trimming attachment, shaving attachment, and a store-and-charge stand.  .caption { font-family: Verdana, Helvetica neue, Arial, serif; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; }     The Bodygrooming System works both in the shower or out, wet or dry. View larger.     The Extra Sensitive attachment is perfect for areas like the groin, and the Extra Large works well for large areas like the chest and back. View larger.    Professional Results, Even in Sensitive Areas The Bodygrooming System takes trimming and shaving to a new level, so you can enjoy professional results at home. Its ergonomic design and separate trimming and shaving attachments offer an easy and painless way to achieve the look you want. You can also use it on all body zones, even your extra sensitive skin areas, such as your chest and abs, underarms, groin area, legs, back, and shoulders.         With the included trimming attachments, you can achieve the perfect look even in your most sensitive skin spots, including the groin area.        The hypoallergenic shaving foils gives you a close, comfortable shave with less irritation, even on the most sensitive skin and in the most sensitive areas.       The chromium stainless steel blades provide an ultra-close shave, and gives long-lasting performance that is maintenance-free!     Advanced Attachments For More Options The Bodygrooming System lets you control how much hair to remove with advanced attachments that offer dependable results. The Extra Sensitive (XS) trimming comb is specially designed for the groin area and underarms, while the Extra Large (XL) trimming comb works best in large areas like the chest and abs, legs, back and shoulders. You can also choose from five lock-in length settings for trimming without completely removing hair. When you're done, the attachments simply rinse clean for easy care. And for a close, smooth and complete shave, use the Bodygroomer System without any attachments. Expertly Handles Thick, Coarse Hair Men's body hair can be coarser than hair on the head and grow in multiple directions, making trimming or shaving certain body zones more challenging. With durable, self-sharpening, stainless steel blades that never need lubrication, and a hypoallergenic shaving foil that cuts with less irritation and protects against nicks and cuts, the Bodygrooming System is virtually maintenance free. This system is powerful enough to get through the thick, coarse hair areas, yet still gentle enough for your sensitive zones, and flexible enough to meet your unique grooming needs. Easy to Use Wet or Dry The Bodygrooming System is water-resistant, which makes it perfect for using in the shower. And if you prefer a dry cut, especially when you're trimming hair, this shaver works just as well dry. Whichever option is best for you, simply move the shaver against the direction of hair growth, stretching the skin when you move the shaving foil across it. The Bodygrooming System comes with a 45-day money back guarantee and a full two-year manufacturer's warranty. What's in the Box Bodygroomer, Extra Sensitive (XS) trimming comb, Extra Large (XL) trimming comb, trimming attachment, shaving attachment, store and charge stand, and a cleaning brush.
title: Philips Norelco BG2030 Professional BodyGrooming System

description: Essential Oil Keys are essential tools for opening and closing essential oil bottles.   - No more sore fingers from trying to wiggle orifice reducers or roller balls.  - No more broken roller balls.  - This means you can stop trying to use knives, teeth or corkscrews.   Easily pry off a standard 5/8 inch diameter orifice reducer or a standard 1/2 inch diameter roller ball, just insert and press down using the larger countersunk half circle on the Cheese Key.   Use the smaller countersunk half circle to pry off a sample sized orifice reducer or ball.   Easily embed a standard 1/2 inch diameter roller ball, just press down on the outside of the ball using the largest circle on the Cheese Key.   Use the other two circles for the 3/8 or 5/16 inch diameter roller bolls. The 5/16 inch circle is countersunk.   The Cheese Key is used for all sizes of essential oil bottles. The Standard Key and Sample Key are non all-in-one tools, but some find these easier to use because there is more surface area of the key available to grip when pressing down.

reviewText: I have been using this product a few years now since a prescitpion medication Drysol was disscontinued & I love this and can not live without it. It is just as good as the prescribed one was. If you are new to it and never used Driclor or  Drysol it could burn and irrate your skin but it will pass after you use it a little while. Tip for that throw baby powder over it and pat it in. Do not use this right after you shave the same night you will go through the roof lol. The best way is on cleaned arm pits no deodorant on them and right before bed wearing an old shirt nothing you like or expensive and when you wake wash it off you do not keep it on, & I find this does work best for me and in beginning of you starting Driclor you use it more often but in time you use less.  I'm at a point I only have to use a few times a month & I was a bad, sweater and this stuff works for me. Do not wear it as like a daily deodorant it is a treatment deodorant and meant for night time to stop over sweating. I know can wear regular deodorant for like my daily regime and for any pit smell, sorry being honest in this review to help but no sweating!! Read the directions it explains there but as a user for many, years I wanted to give some tips. After awhile of use  you will slowly go down to 1 time a week then few times a month, it stops the sweating issue, it did for me anyway, if you stick with it it will. I do not know what I would do if they discontinued this stuff as they did prescription Drysol my Dr used to prescribe. This can't ever be discontinued!!

I had a prescription at Kaiser for this type of deodorant then I switched jobs and healthcare. My biggest concern was how will I get this deodorant....To my surprise a similar deodorant on Amazon and the 2 pack  I bought was the same price as 1 at Kaiser!!!
Works wonders
description: Driclor is for application to the axillae, palms of the hands or soles of the feet. Before applying aluminium chloride hexahydrate, the affected area should be dried thoroughly to avoid burning of the skin (see Warnings and Precautions). Apply Driclor last thing at night after drying the affected areas carefully. Wash off in the morning. Do not re-apply the product during the day. Initially the product may be applied each night until sweating stops during the day. The frequency of application may then be reduced to twice a week or less. Aluminium chloride hexahydrate reacts with water to produce hydrochloric acid. Therefore the areas to be treated should be completely dry before application to avoid skin burning. Application should be restricted to the affected area(s) only. Driclor should not be applied to skin that has been shaved within 12 hours or which is broken or irritated. Hair removal products should not be used on areas to be treated within 12 hours before or after applying Driclor. Avoid contact with eyes, nostrils, mouth or other mucous membranes. In case of accidental contact with the eyes or other mucous membranes, rinse well with water. Avoid direct contact with clothing, jewellery and polished metal surfaces. In the event of accidental oral ingestion rinse the mouth with plenty of water. Further management should be as clinically indicated or as recommended by the national poisons centre, where available.
title: Driclor Under Arm Antiperspirant Roll On - 75ml x 2 bottles

reviewText: Not much of a review, but if you have the lotion shaver, this is a good blade replacement, however, this thing is EXPENSIVE! That is why this one is getting 5 stars, but Norelco needs to lower the price on these. Good thing they last 1 full year (see package) so you only have to pay 30 a year. Just watch out for a box that is about 10x larger than the shaving replacement itself (Packaging is excessive).

A lot of reviews for the Norelco Nivea units have been mixed, some people complained that the heads do not have individual motors and others felt that it didn't give a close enough shave as a wet bladed razor. My experience (which may differ from yours) has been that the Norelco HS85 heads provide the closest shave I have gotten since I started shaving. I've tried every bladed razor imaginable from the Mach 3, Mach 3 Turbo, Mach 3 Fusion, Schick Quattro, to the other disposable units but the Norelco just does a better job.

The heads are easy to disassemble and clean and the combs get close enough to the skin that you get a baby-face smooth shave without irritation or pulling hairs.

The only negative aspect is the cost. After buying three of the HS85 heads (over 3 years), you have spent the equivalent money of buying another electric shaver.

The blades I received were of the same quality as the original that came with the razor.

I did have an issue with the original set of blades. I attempted to cut a six days growth beard. Multiple hairs caused the blades to bend, so that they would spin into the blade guard/cover and cause the motor lock up.

I hope I don't hit my side burns one day and do the same thing.

reviewText: 1. The plastic clamps down, making it feel uncomfortable as it impedes blood flow, like a vise. 2. Since the plastic is firm it may result in leakage along the right and left of the clamp. 3. There are similar products on the market that offers a better fit at cheaper prices.

I wouldn't say it's 100% perfect but does the job when I need it which is not very often.  My two complaints is that the part that clamps down isn't very padded.  I would like it to be a little more cushioned for more extended use.  They say to reposition it every 4 hours; it gets uncomfortable before that.  Second the inner lining is this blue meshy material that would not be my choice for a lining.  If you're engaging in physical activity the material can be irritating, almost like a fine emery cloth.
I have been able to manage my problem to where I need to use the product maybe only a couple times a week, and the leakage is small, one will last me several weeks before I toss it.  I keep one in my pocket at all times.  I know instructions it says it's discreet.  Maybe I'm self-conscious but I think I've only put it on at a urinal once or twice; I almost always go into a stall.
We are happy with the quick service for the product, Acticuf (pack of 10).  We will be ordering more.  Thank you.
description: Acticuf (pack of 10) The Acticuf is a disposable, undetectable pouch designed to help men treat and manage light to moderate urinary incontinence. When placed on the penis, the padded closure gently presses down on the Urethra to control urinary flow. Any

description: Please refer to the instrument as below:  1. Thoroughly cleanse eyelashes. 2. Choose a proper roller based on the actual length of your eyelashes.  3. Apply a thin layer of glue over your eyelashes.  4. Wait a few seconds till the eyelashes become partially dry, stick the roller to the eyelashes. 5. Apply another layer of glue onto the roller and wait another few seconds ( partially dry as well), use a toothpick carefully to turn the eyelashes onto the roller one by one  6. Dip the pink lotion with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller, wait for 10-25 minutes (thin eyelashes: 10-15minnutes, average: 20 minutes, thick eyelashes: 25 minutes) before wiping out.  7. Dip the colour Blue lotion with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller, wait for 10-25 minutes (thin eyelashes: 10-15minnutes, average: 15-18 20 minutes, thick eyelashes: 18-20 minutes) before wiping out. 8. Dip the yellow colour liquid with a cosmetic tip and then apply it onto the roller for about three minutes before wiping out.  9. Dip the Clear liquid with a cosmetic tip to clean the excess glue on the roller. Finally, you have lovely and beautiful eyelashes. Dos and don'ts: 1. Never put this item into the refrigerator, only leave it in the shady and dry place. 2. Never use the same cosmetic tips to dip different lotion or liquid.  3. Never use metallic tips to dip lotion or liquid especially the pink one. 4. If any liquid or lotion goes into eyes, please use eye drops or distilled water to clean eyes.  5. You can't do any facial with steam until the next day after doing it, or the performance would be affected.  Packages : 3x perm agent ,make eyelash natural curly  3x finalizing agent,keep eyelash Curled about 3 months 2x Moisturizing agent ,nourishes eyelashes lining  2x Cleaning agent  1x Eyelash Curler Glue 1x Spatula  16x Curler Rod 6x Curler Patch

The Norelco D-Finer facial hair shaper is specifically designed for creating highly chiseled looks. Recharging takes 10 hours and delivers 40 minutes of operation time. Norelco also includes a 60-day satisfaction guarantee and a 2-year warranty. --Emily Bedard

reviewText:
My wife was very excited to hear that I was going to be trying out the new Gillette CLINICAL strength deoderant.  For the past year my current deoderant (Arrid XX Dry) will get me through about 3/4 of the day, but by dinner time it's time for a reapplication.

I was hoping that the clinical strength in this product would allow me to go with one application in the morning that would get me through the day.  Unfortuantely, my body handled this product just like the Arrid XX Dry.  I put it on in the morning and by 5PM it was time for a reapplication.

However, just like the Arrid product there was no perspiration, just a little odor.  If sweating and moisture is your problem then this product is for you.  However, if you're like me and want to control the smell, then I'd save the extra money and just buy more Arrid because you're going to have to reapply both of them.

I'm a longtime underarm sweater, and have had most success with Old Spice antiperspirants.  I decided to give this Gillette a shot, and needless to say, was a little disappointed.

Does it keep my drier?  Well, when used correctly (apply at night, which was hard to get used to) and not washing underneath my arms in the shower in the morning, it worked slightly better than what I'm used to.  The problem is, however, that it's not realistic.  Sure, I can get used to applying deodorant on at night.  But can I get used to NOT scrubbing underneath my arms during my morning shower?  Ummm...no.

I tried the unscented kind, which was fine - literally no scent.  I experienced no irritation or any other kind of side effect from it.

I ended up being slightly drier, but still sweaty using the Gillette.  I'm sure everyone is different, and maybe I'm a profuse sweater, but it just didn't work enough for me to justify the premium (costs over twice what I normally get for marginal results).

It might be worth a shot if you're desperately looking for a solution to underarm perspiration.  It's certainly a cheaper alternative than paying for $700 Botox injections every 6 months.  But don't expect this to be the answer to your prayers.  At least for me, it certainly wasn't.
Wow. This stuff does the trick.  You will be able to stand next to someone after you have run 10 miles and raise your arm without them passing out. For real! This stuff works like magic.
description:
Gillette advanced solid Sport Triumph features triple protection technology
Change your Life. Not your Shirt. Do you suffer from or worry about excessive perspiration? Gillette Clinical Strength provides 34-percent better wetness protection than a prescription product (6.25-percent AlCl3) and gives you confidence by helping you feel dry and smell fresh all day. Ready to change your life? Then it's time for Gillette Clinical Strength with its refreshing Arctic Clean scent.
 .caption { font-family: Verdana, Helvetica neue, Arial, serif; font-size: 10px; font-weight: bold; font-style: italic; } ul.indent { list-style: inside disc; text-indent: 20px; } table.callout { font-family: Verdana, Helvetica, Arial, serif; margin: 10px; width: 250; } td.callout { height: 100 percent; background: #9DC4D8 url(https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/G/01/electronics/detail-page/callout-bg.png) repeat-x; border-left: 1px solid #999999; border-right: 1px solid #999999; padding: 10px; width: 250px; } ul.callout { list-style: inside disc; text-indent: -12px; font-size: 12px; line-height: 1.5em; } h5.callout { text-align: center; }     Odor-fighting microcapsules keep you smelling fresh all day long. View larger.     Why is Gillette Clinical Strength better? Gillette Clinical Strength Anti-Perspirant Deodorant is made for men who experience or worry about excessive underarm perspiration. Daily use provides them with better protection and more confidence that they have control over their perspiration and their lives. Its Triple-Protection Technology:  Provides prescription-strength wetness protection Contains odor-fighting microcapsules Contains skin-conditioning ingredients to help minimize irritation 
Is Gillette Clinical Strength for everyone? Gillette Clinical Strength is designed for heavy sweaters, but can provide confidence and prescription-strength protection to anyone who experiences or worries about excessive underarm perspiration.
Is Gillette Clinical Strength doctor-recommended? More than 95-percent of doctors surveyed say they endorse the use of Gillette Clinical Strength to control excessive underarm perspiration and the problems associated with it.
Should I use Gillette Clinical Strength differently? Gillette Clinical Strength can be effective when used as you use traditional anti-perspirants, but for optimal results, follow these instructions carefully:  Apply Gillette Clinical Strength at bedtime to minimize excess nighttime perspiration. An additional morning application is not necessary; you will be protected throughout the day, even if you bathe or shower after application. If you neglect to apply it at night, morning application will still provide strong protection.  Gillette Clinical Strength should be applied according to your personal needs. A light layer is recommended, and three clicks per arm is the average. But because Gillette Clinical Strength is so gentle on your skin, you may apply as much as you feel is necessary.  Most men find the nighttime application sufficient to control excessive wetness for the following day. However, if you feel more protection is needed, a morning reapplication of Gillette Clinical Strength, or the use of another anti-perspirant, is acceptable. 
How is Gillette Clinical Strength better than a prescription underarm product?  Many prescription strength anti-perspirants contain the active ingredient aluminum chloride. Aluminum chloride is more acidic than the active ingredient in Gillette Clinical Strength. Research has shown that anti-perspirants which contain aluminum chloride can be irritating to the underarm skin. In fact, the skin irritation is often so severe that discontinued use is required. In addition, aluminum chloride can be damaging to some clothing, often causing staining and/or discoloration.
Gillette Clinical Strength does not contain aluminum chloride. In fact, its patented formula contains powerful Triple Protection Technology with skin conditioning ingredients that will help minimize irritation.
How does Gillette Clinical Strength provide 34-percent better wetness protection than a prescription product (6.25-percent AlCl3)? Gillette Clinical Strength was tested in two 10-day clinical studies against a current marketed prescription anti-perspirant. Subjects had product applied to their underarms everyday for nine days. Both products were applied at bedtime as current marketed prescription products instruct to "apply at night." In both studies, Gillette Clinical Strength performed significantly better than the prescription product for providing wetness protection throughout the study. Overall, the clinical studies resulted in Gillette Clinical Strength providing 34-percent better wetness protection than a prescription product.
Why do we perspire?  Sweating is your bodys way of releasing excess heat and cooling itself. Sweating is natural under any condition, but sweating can be intensified by any number of elements, including warm weather, exercise and stress.
   Bedtime application gives you effective protection the following day.   How much perspiration is too much? Excessive sweating is not fully understood and can be related to any number of medical or physiological conditions, including hyperhidrosis. Only you can decide if your sweating is excessive. Gillette Clinical Strength is designed to provide protection for anyone who feels embarrassed by his perspiration, or unable to control it.
What is an anti-perspirant?  Anti-perspirants block the flow of sweat from sweat glands, thus reducing wetness. Because perspiration stimulates odor-causing bacteria, anti-perspirant also reduces body odor. Additionally, most anti-perspirants are scented, so they fight odor even more.
How does anti-perspirant work? Anti-perspirants use sweat against itself. Once applied, the anti-perspirant is dissolved by sweat, and the dissolved anti-perspirant particles form superficial plugs just below the skins surface. These plugs block the release of more perspiration. Generally, the plugs will stay in place for about 24 hours and are then washed away over time.
If sweating is natural, will this product be too strong and affect my body's ability to cool itself? Absolutely not! Reducing sweating in the underarm has virtually no effect on the body's ability to cool itself. The number of sweat glands in the underarms represents a very small area of the body. There are many sweat glands on other parts of your body. So, the vast majority of your body heat is released from other parts of your body.
Why should I use Gillette Clinical Strength at bedtime? At night, your bodys temperature and sweat rate slow. By applying Gillette Clinical Strength as this is occurring, little or no anti-perspirant is washed away by sweat, and you ensure great effectiveness of the plugs. Applied at night, Gillette Clinical Strength is so effective that morning reapplication is not even required, though it is permissible.
title: Gillette Clinical Advance Solid Sport Triumph 1.7 Ounce

reviewText:
I started using the Glytone facial lotion step 1 (light moisture)along with the Glytone Mild Gel wash (non-drying)and AFIRM 2x (non-irritating to me)at the suggestion of my dermatologist. The combo helps control my VERY oily skin and makes my pores look smaller.

When I ordered off Amazon, I stepped things up to Step 2 in the lotion and AFIRM 3x. I will continue to use these products.

This is a fantastic retinol product at a much better price point than the competition.  My dermatologist recommended it for that reason.  It works beautifully and is non irritating if you slowly work up to the 3X from the 2X.  Needs a moisturizer over it however because it is not very moisturizing.

This is certainly a good product for the money, but be careful. Retinol products like this one can do a real number on sensitive skin. If you are just starting to use products such as this one, seriously consider using the lowest strength product first. I know that when the lines start showing on your face, your first inclination is to use the highest strength product available. But if your skin is sensitive or not used to retinol products, you may end up with much more peeling than you anticipated and/or be stuck with turning your skin into something that feels like a face mask. So please, start with the 1x product and work your way up.

reviewText:
It was not my 1st time to use wax, however this is the worst wax I've ever used. It's sticky and hard to remove from skin and wax remover lotion doesn't work. It gave me a hard time to take it off my skin, and the only way to remove it is by scribing.
I used microwave bikini wax from the same brand before and it was good, but this one is very bad and wast of time and money.

I have used a few different home waxing kits and this is by far the worst. The hot wax spurted out of the container as soon as I tried to gently mix it after only 30 seconds in the microwave (per the directions), which managed to ruin my tee shirt and burn my left hand, splatter all over my counters and floors. This is pro grade wax so there is no real solution to removing the wax other than scrubbing - your skin and any surface it lands on. The 'wax removal' lotion the kit includes is a joke. If I could give this negative stars I would - I don't think I have ever been more disappointed in a product. I managed to remove some leg hair but frankly the hour and a half I spent cleaning wax off my skin and my kitchen is not worth the effort, nor is the ruined tee shirt or the burn on my left hand.
Works fine but I wouldn't use it for the bikini line and further, makes the skin very tender. Hard wax was better for that.
description: Gigi All Purpose Honee Microwave Kit, 16 Ounce
title: Gigi All Purpose Honee Microwave Kit, 16 Ounce

reviewText: I would not recommend this product I didn't even want to give it one star. Here is our story. My daughter bought one bottle of this dye. Her hair length is about 3-4 inches below her shoulders. I told her that she probably needed more then one bottle. So she decided to do half her hair black and half this Aqua color. It ended up that about 2/3 of her hair is black and only the crown of her head extending about 4-5 inches from the top was going to be aqua. But the one bottle didn't even completely cover that much of her hair, nor was it the vibrant color on the packaging. Before I procede allow me to add that my mom, who went to beauty school and owned her own salon, was the one doing the dying at my daughters request after she bought it. While it does say on the packaging that longer hair may require more then one bottle it is still falsely adverstising the brightness of the color, and yes it was bleached first, as well as the coverage. Almost all the female models pictured on their packages have long hair. I can guestimate that you will need 6-8 bottles for that length of hair and thickness. The bottles are only half the size of those you find in other hair dye kits. It was a complete disappointment after spending her Christmas money to end up like this. The stuff isn't cheap.
It doesn't seem to want to stay in any type of hair, I love the colors and selection but I can pay less for something that will stay in my hair

This was the first time I'd ever bleached or colored my hair.  I have somewhat thin, light brown, long, wavy hair that I never, ever blow dry, straighten, or curl.

I decided on the aqua color after looking up videos of people dying their hair on youtube and seeing the process and results there.  I ended up with Splat because, for the amount of hair that I actually wanted to dye (just some streaks, not my whole head), it was the most cost-efficient, since it includes bleach in the kit.

The bleach was not particularly strong.  I bleached my hair for about 45 minutes the first time, and it brought my hair to a dirty blonde.  I decided to go lighter and did another 45 minutes later and got to a very light blonde, but definitely not platinum by any means.  My hair, since it's thin, was pretty weak and a little stretchy after that, but it's bleach and that's what happens.  I decided that it was light enough, and it recovered within a week with some care and conditioning.

I knew my hair wouldn't absorb the dye that well, so I left the dye in for about 50 minutes the first time I dyed it, and it came out great.  I was very excited about the color-- more green than what's shown on the box, but still a strong aqua.  The color only ran for a few days after I dyed it, and not in large amounts.  I did get some on a pillow when I absent-mindedly let my wet hair sit on it after a shower, but within a week, my clothes and other cloth items were safe.  It faded into a turqoise-green pretty quickly, however, and about three weeks later I decided to re-dye it.  Again, the color was awesome, but again, it faded into a light, turquoise-green.  The color is still noticeable, but it is nowhere near as bright or strong as the first couple weeks I had it.  I'm kind of fond of it, though, since it looks much more "natural" (as natural as green gets!).
description: Splat Hair Color Complete Kit - Aqua Rush
title: SPLAT Hair Color Complete Kit, Aqua Rush,

reviewText: Nice material, pretty colors, but seem smaller than 24x24

I have been buying a lot of scarves on Amazon lately. I'm completely hooked on collecting these affordable luxury items. These scarves are better than advertised. The description says polyester, the tag says 40% silk. They feel wonderful, very soft with a nice drape. The colors are bright and vivid.

A 24 x 24 scarf is the best size to tie in a kerchief, in my opinion. The 34x34 scarves are too big and overwhelming. The 20x20 scarves work, but you get little short tails. Short tails look cute under your ear, sitting on your shoulder. But I wanted more color in front.

The 24x24 scarf gives you longer tails. You can tie the scarf loosely around your neck, and get nice size tails that sit just above your boobs. This draws attention upwards, and gives you a better silhouette. A strategic scarf can hide a lot of problems, like wobbly neck parts, while at the same time adding brightness to your outfit. I feel great when I wear one of these scarves and I always look better in selfies when I am wearing one.

If you want tips on how to tie a scarf, look on YouTube.
They were great!
description: There are 4 scarves in this one set. Nothing completes an outfit more than a scarf. This scarf can be worn on your head or your neck to add a touch of class and elegance. reviewText: I have never used this product but I have been using Toppik for about 5 years now and it works great on thinning hair, but only if you have some hair to begin with. I use the template for the hairline and the hair spray to hold it on all day long. It washes out easily. It does take a little time to perfect the application. I also use the atomizer. My crown bald spot completely disappears and looks natural. It matches my hair color exactly. The hairline is the tricky part, but practise makes perfect. I love it. My wife loves it and calls be baldy without it. I hope I have enough hair on my head to continue to use it for years to come. I repeat, if you are already bald forget it. It's only for thinning hair.

First off I'm 29 with only thinning hair in the front. I would not recommend if you are completely bald or just about there. This product only covers up balding spots that have enough hair to attach itself to. So of course results will vary based on the amount of hair you have. With that said I'm completely satisfied with the product. My expectations were to only cover up while I try various methods to regrow or at least slow my sudden hair loss. My only concern is how long the product will last. I have only thinning hair and have to apply a lot compared to the you tube video. perhaps the black color that is in the videos has better coverage than dark brown. I bought the smaller of the two sizes to see if it actually worked and I can say for me I'm pleased and will purchase another bottle only this time I will go for the 28g. It does seem to go a bit everywhere so make sure your a few inches above application area and tapping it in does seem to disperse it better. Also the fibers stay in very well. I was up until midnight first day installing carpet sweating a lot and did not notice it falling out so it lasted from 11:00am when it came through midnight and only then until I washed it out. One thing to note is it took two rinses before I felt like it was out. Your hair may also feel dry when its in. I will update just how long the product lasts when I run out. Good luck

description: Vietnamese Cassia "Saigon" Cinnamon The overall flavor of the Vietnamese cinnamon is similar to the Chinese Tung Hing cassia cinnamon, but the oil content of the Saigon variety is higher and it is much more powerful. Saigon Cinnamon is produced primarily in Vietnam, both for domestic use and export. The Vietnam War disrupted production, but since the beginning of the early 21st century Vietnam has resumed export of the spice, including to the United States, where it was unavailable for nearly 20 years. Although it is called Saigon Cinnamon, it is not produced in the area around the southern city of Saigon, but instead in the central and northern regions of the country, particularly the Qu?ng Nam Province of central Vietnam. Saigon Cinnamon is used primarily for its aromatic bark, which is quite similar to that of Cassia but with a more pronounced, complex aroma.
title: New Fresh Ground Saigon Cinnamon-10.7 oz(303g)

reviewText: Best brushes EVER
These brushes are not sturdy at all

I am so impressed with this make up brush set! I use Bare Minerals powder make up and having been searching for a long time for a set of brushes that I actually enjoy using with this make up. I have had a couple sets before this and the biggest turn off to a set is when they come smelling like chemicals.  However, this set of brushes came out scent free! There are actually a few details that I find quite unique that make this set stand out:

-The handles: this actually really surprised me at first. The necks of these brushes bend! When I first used them I was amazed that when I pushed a little too hard the brush gave and flexed rather than pushing back.
-The head: I also like that the head is perpendicular to the base, rather than straight out. I find this takes slightly different muscles to control the bushes, but this angle makes way more sense to me.
-The bristles- these are firmer- or maybe what I mean is that the bristles are denser?- than other brushes I've used. Despite the density, they are extremely soft and very responsive when I'm brushing my Bare Minerals make up on.
- The different shapes and sizes: I love how much variety there is in this set. While I don't know exactly what I would use each shape for yet, I love the variety and how much more control it gives me over when my make up goes on my face.

Overall, I'm very happy with this set of makeup brushes and it makes me excited to put make up in the mornings!

I received these brushes for free for my honest and unbiased review.

reviewText: After reading the reviews I decided to purchase this oil.  My hair has been breaking and I have noticed that it is thinning so I was looking for something that would help to thicken my hair.  Since most reviews commented on increased body, that helped to make a decision.  I just applied this oil to my hair for the first time, and oh the softness, I also like the smell.  The instruction say to use it for 1-4 months to see the difference, so in about 4 months I will be able to comment on my progress.

Brahmi Amla oil by vadik herbs is the best brahmi amla oil. It doesn't contain mineral oil or carzy chemicals and perservatives. Some people are put off by the scent, but if you were brought up around frankincese and myrrh incense then the scent won't bother you. I am completely addicted to this product because it has made my hair stronger and healthy. If you have problems with breakage and slow growth I would absolutely recommend this product. Thank You vadik herbs for producing a high quality natural product!!!!!

We (especially my husband) were very skeptical while buying this product and hence waited long to see if it works before writing a review. We have been using it for over a year now. My husband had been losing a lot of hair due to stress and other health issues and that's the reason I thought of trying out this product. This oil has a strong smell but sweet like any other Indian herbal oils. My husband has new hair growth on areas of scalp where hair didn't exist for couple of months. His hair also looks thicker than before.
He uses this oil 2-3 times a week and massages his scalp gently with his fingers for 5-10 minutes. He leaves the oil on the hair overnight and washes it off with shampoo in the morning. I use this oil once once a week.
I would definitely recommend an old t-shirt or a thick old pillow cover to put on the pillow, so that the oil from the hair does not soil the pillow. Also covering the head with a scarf or cap helps the oil to be absorbed better by the scalp.
Another good thing is that the base of the oil is sesame oil and not mineral oil like in many other hair oils.
It has a calming effect and helps me to sleep better. I would totally recommend it to anyone wanting healthy hair and better sleep.
description: Brahmi Amla Hair Oil (8 oz) by Vadik Herbs | Ayurvedic herbal hair growth oil and hair conditioning oil | Great for hair loss, balding, thinning of hair, for beard growth, herbal scalp treatment

reviewText: It is simple and beautiful.  I am giving a gift bag with everything for my son who is into Civil War reenactment.  I am sure he will like it.

We kept our source of the Night Queen original because we wanted to be taken back to the time when the Queen would wear the fragrance stroll the gardens full of her favorite flowers and the King would adore her.*Our Raat Ki Raani Fragrance Oil has a pleasing, light and sweet aroma of this special type of Jasmine flower that blooms only at night emanating the beautiful scent when few are around to experience it. A sure to please, calming and mood uplifting scent great for any occasion, casual wear or use in shower and Aroma Therapy oil lamps.*At GreenPlanet-Organics, all of our Fragrance oils are high quality, safe for skin use and use natural and 100% Vegan friendly, alcohol free base. reviewText: Even though I had read the reviews, I thought these would work if I was extra careful in handling them.  I attempted to place the tips  on with a tweezers.  What a mess.  First of all, the tips are much too wide and long (even though my hands are NOT petite).  After placing a few tips on, they wrinkled easily and began to tear when touching them.  And because they are much too long, when I attempted to lightly file the tips [downward motion, according to the directions], the edges became ragged and torn.  Definitely a waste of my time and money.  Just 3 nails took up 45 minutes of my time before I used acetone to remove them.  Spare yourself the aggravation!

I bought these after purchasing the sally hansen gel manicure kit. I tried doing a french tip with regular nail polish, but it just didn't look right. I thought about using gel white, but I figured that it would create a "lip" or step on the nail due to the thickness after curing. Plus, the gel doesn't dry like normal, so you can't shape it with the acetone as you would with regular polish. Anyways, these were pretty easy to use and they look much better than what I did with normal white tip polish. I knocked them down a star because I had to cut the sides to make them fit on most of my fingers....wish they made these in petite size!

I tried the tips immediately thinking "Yes! The perfect way to have great looking tips!" Since i really suck at painting them with my non-dominant hand...

The first nail I did went on flawlessly! I was immediately hooked! I ended up doing my whole hand and thats when the problem began..

Pro's:
-Cheap to purchase
-Look great for the first 5 minutes...

Con's:
-Sticky...very sticky! They stick to EVERYTHING other than the nail. Once I finally got 1 on my nail and began to file - as directed...it peeled up and cracked and broke
-Look CHEAP!
-When trying to get 1 out of the package...about 4 others lifted up with it b/c they stick to everything
-Thin/Fragile - they crack/break/peel off before you can even add the top coat or file down

I wish I would have looked at reviews before purchasing, but I guess i'm glad they only cost me a couple of bucks..
description: Pack of 2 - sensational gel polish 71710 French manicure tips
title: Sensationail French Manicure Tips"ONLY" #71710

reviewText: Well used it one time.. Worked fine... Went to reload it started candle up and the metal hanger broke the ceramic piece fell sideways spilling its contents glad I was right there and the candle didn't go flying somewhere and start my house on fire...
Very nice look and quality. Great value for the money.

I ordered this because I already have one in earthtone colors which I use frequently, and I liked the red too. This is what I have found by trial and error to be helpful in using this style of burner for aromatic oil diffusion(I have never used it with wax, so can't comment on that)
*I first add a total of about 15-25 drops of oil first--then hang the diffuser (you can easily and gently adjust the bend in the suspending wire if necessary to keep the liquid level) I then fill the reservoir with  just enough water so it doesn't slop out and waste my oils and make a mess. You will learn the right amount.  If you don't have a steady hand, add your water (a small watering can or plastic water bottle work well) after placing the diffuser where you want to end up lighting it.
* I mix a few drops of 2 to 4 different oils, depending on my mood and how strong the aromas are.  There really is no wrong combination if you like the individual oils themselves.  If you don't know which ones to start with, get one of the sampler kits with 6 small bottles of basic oils in it to  find out your preferences and how much you want to use.  My basic mix usually has about 10 drops of peppermint, 4 drops of lavender, 6 drops of eucalyptus and a little lemon oil.  Or not. That's really the point--this process is not a chemistry experiment or gourmet recipe that will be messed up if you don't put in the exact amounts and types of oils in the proper sequence. I guess I also like a stronger fragrance than some people.  If you must follow directions, exactly, try one of the many books about aromatherapy, or talk with a helpful health food store employee--but I suggest waiting until after you've done some basic experimenting on your own.  The effects of oils can be different in different people, so pay attention to how you're feeling  and don't get tenser if a "stress reducer" doesn't, for example. Have fun with it. Explore the possible health benefits.  Find different ways to use the oils(this is where the books and advice help.)
*Tea lights work best-no votives; they're too hot.  If you notice any smoking (I never have) or the liquid dries up before the candle goes out (unusual with the right water to oil mixture) just add a little  more water.
* These oils generally are not intended for human consumption--it's been a long time since my son tried to consume everything he could get his little hands on, but if I do ever have grandchildren (hmm..... maybe with the right oils as a Christmas present?)  I'd keep this stuff out of reach.
description: Red Droplet Hanging Oil Warmer and Wax Burner
title: Red Droplet Hanging Oil Warmer and Wax Burner

reviewText:
Never have I seen a company torpedo themselves in the foot so bad. The original formula for Live Wire and Double Impact was great and truly a revolution for the industry. Smelled great, moisturized, lasted. They changed the formula recently, which amounted to watering down the scent and active ingredient in an apparent over the top effort to increase profits by using less ingredient. No change in price in an already pricey product line.

Bottom line is that it's a bad product now. 5 stars to 1 star, and I'm not kidding. I literally went from using only this, to none of it. Don't buy this product!

I have been using this product for about half a year now and I really like it. I used the other Old Spice body washes that don't have the "Hydrating formula" and found them to not lather as well and also make you seem to use a lot more as compared to this one which seems to only need a little bit and you are set. I also think the sent is good as it not to overpowering. So if you have used just the gel body wash I suggest giving it a try, especially this sent, the Double Impact version is good but I prefer this one better.

To put it plainly: This stuff is awful. The only positive thing I can say about it is that it fulfils the function of soap and gets you clean, but for the money and time a bar of Dial will do the same thing without the nasty smell.

I am a fan of the Old Spice liquid soap line, and I've always liked the way Old Spice smells. So when I saw this stuff I bought it on a whim. Big mistake.

First of all the color is mildly nauseating, not that that really matters. Irish spring is about the same color complete with the swirls of lighter green. But then there's the texture.. The nozzle of the Livewire is extra wide, presumably to allow this semi-gelatinous gunk to gloop out of the bottle at a reasonable rate instead of having to noisily squirt out of the usual small hole. The texture of this stuff bears a worrying resemblance to that of congealed chicken grease.

Then there is the smell. When I opened the bottle in the store and sniffed it didn't smell too bad. Rather unusual, maybe, but I thought I'd give it a go. I quickly discovered that taking a hurried whiff in the store and actually rubbing the stuff on your body are two completely different things. The odd, somewhat refreshing scent that I experienced in the supermarket turned to a sour, nasal-coating odor that actually left a metallic taste in my mouth just from smelling it.

How can that be? That a liquid soap that's not designed to interact with the digestive system in any way should leave a metallic taste in your mouth?!

In conclusion, if anyone has bothered to read this far, there are plenty of Red Zone washes available, or barring that, plenty of other brands out there that aren't nearly as nasty as this stuff. If this is the only thing available then it's a good time to have a serious heart-to-heart with the store manager about other career options that don't involve the use their personal tastes.

Not worth it.
description: Old Spice Red Zone Body Wash, Game Day unique, long-lasting scents developed just for guys. Refreshing lather slams away dirt and odor. Hydrating formula leaves your skin feeling smooth, not tight or dry. The hydrating formula keeps your skin smooth, just like they like it, and its 8 hours scent technology keeps you smelling great.
title: Old Spice Red Zone Body Wash, Live Wire, 16-Ounce Bottle (Pack of 3)

description: Details & Care What it is: An instant miracle mascara tested on the red carpet, that extends and holds your lashes out, giving you the longest, most luscious lashes of your life. Who it's for: Anyone who wants lashes with extraordinary volume. What it does: Giving your lashes 13 times the volume with just three coats, this mascara is formulated with a unique blend of waxes and ingredients to ensure that it's hydrating and full of bounce, nourishing, strengthening, protecting and stimulating the growth of your lashes, all while feeling weightless. It's designed with an innovative, multi-bristle flutter brush that features bristles of differing sizes to ensure that even the most fine and short lashes are caught and coated for a separated, elongated look. How to use: There are many ways to wear one mascara, and the way you apply it can dramatically change the shape and size of your eye. Charlotte recommends powdering the eye area before applying mascara, and sticking to application on your top lashes because of its its creamy, oil-based formula. Charlotte has three different methods for application to create a bigger, more intense or elongated eye. - The Wing Lash: a technique that elongates the eye for a seductive, hypnotic look. Hold the brush diagonally across your lashes and pull the brush up and out. - The Doll Lash: a technique that opens up your eye for an innocent, youthful look. Hold the brush vertically and pull up through the lashes from root to tip. - The False Lash: a technique that intensifies and frames the eye for a glamorous red-carpet look. Hold the brush horizontally across the lashes and pull up in a zigzag action, nestling the brush first in the lashline.
title: Charlotte Tilbury Legendary Lashes Instant Hollywood False-Lash Effect Mascara

I really wanted to try out the Bite Beauty lipsticks and I thought that this was a good deal, but I am beyond disappointed.

reviewText: it is a good product and the only downside is that to buy a new one you need to pay again for the kit with comber. Should be offered only the refill of the sheets.

This is the best idea if you or someone in your life shaves or trims their own hair. These are perfect for keeping the hair from going down the sink (which has clogged up our sink in the past). My husband is a very messy shaver and he hates shaving. So he lets his beard grow to the point that he needs to use the trimmer to knock off the majority of the hair before he can actually shave with a razor. You can imagine the mess! He tries to clean it up but honestly doesn't do a very good job (sorry honey but you know it's true). These covers cut down on so much, if not all, of that mess. The only drawback is that if your husband is super messy and just sends hair flying everywhere then there may still be a little mess. Fortunately it will be greatly minimized though. The sheets are 36x24 according to the package so they are an adequate size depending on the size of your sink. I also agree with other reviewers that these could have multiple uses from crafts to spreading one under your child's plate to minimize the mess on your table or high chair, which would be especially good for children learning to feed themselves. The included comb is nice and seems to be good quality.

Now on to the price. I personally think $25 for a box of disposable plastic sink covers and a comb is ridiculous. I guess it is up to you to determine how much you want to minimize your messes and cleaning and if the expense is worth it to you, but honestly had I not gotten this at a discounted rate for review I would have never paid this for them. You could use a trash bag for pennies. What I don't understand is that you can buy a box of just the sink covers for $12.50 (used to be 9.99) but add in the comb and it goes to $25 (oh and when I ordered these for review the price was $35). That is just nuts to me. So needless to say I would not personally buy these again at this price. The product is great, which is why it is getting 5 stars, but it's not $25 great.

*I received this item at a free or reduced rate in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion. All statements are my own and I do not just give positive reviews for free products. I will provide my honest opinion even if it is an unfavorable one.*

reviewText:
Ah, the days of boyhood. Looking up at your dad or grandpa, admiring the skill with which he wields the razor. The hot water steaming upwards, carrying with it the scent of his shaving cream. Brings back memories, huh?

Well, for over a year now I'd been using Gillette Foamy Regular to great satisfaction. It smells spicy--think Christmas--and lubricates the blade well. The scent went nicely with my Every Man Jack aftershave cooling gel (you can really get the Christmas scents going).

But I always had one gripe about the Regular formula Gillette Foam: the burn.

I haven't figured out why, but it burned my skin. I have eczema, so shaving burns anyways, but phew. Still, I kept using it because the price was right and I don't like the gels. My last can of the regular was running out, so I was going to pick up a new can.

I got to the store and this Sensitive formulation foam was sitting right next to it. I figure "what the heck, I'll give it a shot."

Well, I just got back from using it and holy tacos, Batman. That smell punched me right in the face; it was the smell that used to waft up from the sink when my dad would shave and I'd look on, wishing I had some manly stubble to demolish with a miniature axe.

So, indeed, I love it, but I'm biased.

Impartially I can say that it goes on smoother and seems thicker overall than the regular formulation, and instead of burning my skin it cooled it. It lubricated well, though that manly stubble I always dreamed of is, in reality, about half as dense as I'd wished it to be.

All in all I can definitely recommend this.

One thought though. The smell, no matter how fantastic it is to me, is fairly faint but lingers, and it could be judged by some younger people as smelling too much like something their grandpa would wear. I still love it though.

I just used a razor for the first time today along with this cream, and it keeps my face well hydrated for a very comfortable shave! The hair just comes right off! And the smell is awesome, almost like an aftershave smell! Didn't get any cuts or nicks or anything!

A terrific buy.  You are likely NOT going to beat this price. Wal-Mart price is $12.21 for 3. Same 11 oz. container just without the large round top cap, only difference. Buy it this way and stock up. You can find room.  Recommended. And, it's an excellent shaving foam.
description: Gillette foamy shave cream, sensitive has a thick extra rich creamy lather for a close comfortable shave. Contains special lubricants to protect sensitive skin. Spreads easily, rinses clean leaving skin feeling soft and smooth.
title: Gillette Foamy Shaving Cream, Sensitive Skin, 11 Ounce (Pack of 12), Mens Razors/Blades

reviewText:
Good, well made product. Honestly, for a full-grown man, such as myself, it can be nearly impossible to actually get the mid to upper part of your back clean. This nice, discreet back and body scrubber does the trick. It's made of very durable material, which means that it will probably be around for a long time.

One side of the back scrubber is rough, which is great at exfoliating dead skin. The other is soft, which worked well with my body soap (good sudsing action)

All-in-all I recommend this fine product, you won't be disappointed.

I've used a lot of loofah's, but this one is by far my favorite. It's designed to be for the back, but I didn't stop there. It made all my skin feel smooth and polished without being to abrasive on my sensitive skin. This exfoliated better then the others I've used in the past. It held my body wash well, but also rinsed clean easily.
I love this thing. I finally feel like I don't need to hide my loofah to keep my man card.
description: Amazing soft and smooth skin is what you'll have after using the Mineral Springs Luxuries exfoliating back and body scrubber. The 30 inch long scrubber is long enough to ensure you can reach all those hard to reach places. It's one of the longest scrubbers you can purchase, which makes it perfect for men and women of all sizes. We want to make sure you can exfoliate and clean exactly what you want to clean, so we made the scrubber an extra thick 4 inches wide. Some of the cheap thinner ones will just roll up on themselves, twist, or fold in half. Why waste your hard earned money on something so inferior? Customers told us they wanted a scrubber just tough enough on one side, but soft and gentle on the other. We delivered with this scrubber one side of the scrubber feels like a loofah, and will exfoliate your skin nicely. Next, turn the scrubber over and polish your skin with the soft, gentle cotton side. Your back and skin will thank you for it the straps are made out of strong, long lasting rope handles. They have just enough give in it to ensure you can move the scrubber in any direction you need it, but is strong enough to handle all the scrubbing you can give it the Mineral Springs Luxuries loofah scrubber is great for personal use, or great to give as a gift pair the scrubber up with your favorite body soap, and you have the perfect spa gift to give to your friends, co-workers and loved ones.
title: Mineral Springs Luxuries Exfoliating Loofah Back And Body Scrubber For Shower For Men And Women

reviewText: Loved the plants but they both arrived damaged and bent!
Organic

Emeritus Gardens does a solid job selling a product that I never thought I would purchase online. I had spoke with Jill at Emeritus at length about nasty sell tactics of online retailers and learned how tough small businesses have it on Amazon. It was agreed that I would evaluate the product and provide a fair and unbiased review of it. The hope is that my fellow customers would see my ranking and know that this review comes from an honest place. I hope that my track record (96% positive from the community :) ) will help offset some of the shady "fake" reviews that have haunted Jill and her company.

Service: Jill was responsive and straight forward. A rarity among my interactions with companies, Jill actually takes care of and grows her products. This isn't some pump out warehouse. Jill cares. Selling plants on Amazon has to be tough. Dealing with the "my plant didn't look like the picture" has to come about often and the mishandling of product during shipping can ruin a customers experience. I was pleased with the level of care and detail that Jill put forth.

Quality: I received the Aloe plants over 2 months ago. They were packaged perfectly and wrapped just as you see in the pictures. The aloe is thick and full. Much larger than any other Aloe plant that i've owned. My girlfriends plant looks like a spec compared to these! I typically wait 2-3 weeks to write a review but live things need time. I wanted to make sure that the product "lived" up to expectations. The plants have stood the test of time. I was initially disappointed because two of the spines had issues, one was dying and the other was on the way out. The impact to the overall look of the plant was minimal and at this price I would be very happy with my purchase.

Summary: Worth the price for thick well maintained Aloe plants. Natural issues with live products but overall a great experience.

I decided to take a star away because of the dead spine. The other one is actually recovering quite well. The dead spine is in no way a deal breaker on the product.
description: Potted in organic soil which allows strong growth and perfect drainage. Healthy large and strong as shown. Makes a great house plant or can be planted outdoors in moderate and subtropical climates. Wonderful gift for any occasion. 8 page usage and care booklet included with each order. Packed with care and shipped by priority mail with tracking and insurance.
title: 2 Florida Grown Aloe Vera Plants 12-14 Inches Tall Strong and Healthy

reviewText:
Hot stuff! This copulins cover fragrance needs just a little bit of dry down time. You don't want wet cops on your clothing even if they are buried in a dead sexy cover scent. Based off LPMP's popular "LP Red" fragrance. This exotic & spicy scent is sweetened with a squeeze of juicy apricot. The Copulins also add a sexy sweetness. The result is an over the top hot/sweet sexy scent that will cause whiplash as you walk by.
I have had quite a few responses from men with this. Some people really respond and move in close. Use with caution. It is serious stuff. No joke. Save it for sexy time and follow the application instructions on the accompanying bookmark.

This stuff is amazing! I ordered a trial size for $5 before ordering the full size. But just use a little! Too much is too overwhelming and sickening. Just a dab on my neck is all it takes. Drives men nuts, in a good way!

This is so far my favorite of the OCCO line in terms of scent, cause in terms of results all shields are awesome. To my nose it's a brighter LP Red. The two of them work amazingly well together. I have gone through so many bottles of them i have lost count :)

Please check our other listings for more great OCCO varieties.

reviewText: This product works very well and is smooth.  It feels soft and does not feel like it is pulling the hairs from my face (when used with one day of growth).  The ability to rinse the razor under water is a nice feature.  The cleaning solution seems use up very quickly.

All in all this is a very good razor, it gives me a good shave, the charge lasts a long time and it's very easy to clean. Like all electric razors, in my case, it does not shave my neck area very well and I have to just "neaten" the area with a regular blade. I have yet to find an electric razor that can do this however so I can't fault this model too much. In general it gives a clean, close shave and I am enjoying it very much. I love the fact that you can just rinse it under the sink to clean it and the battery indicator is a nice feature that most lower priced models don't have.

I have been using Norelco products for many years.  This razor gives a close shave but is uncomfortable when shaving.  My older one still shaves smoother but not quite as close as this new model.  When you wet your face or razor everything changes - it is smooth and shaves close.  If you leave the razor in the cleaning unit and it is still wet then you use it, you will get a great shave.  The instructions about battery charging goes back to the dark ages of rechargable batteries.  It they use the old type that require all these proceedures to avoid "memory" then this is indeed a CHEAP product.

reviewText: I got this razor as a gift last Christmas. I knew the whole Norelco line pretty well, and when I got this I thought it was the 'Bottom Line Razor' However, I believe that this razor does such a good job, that if the price was 60, even 70 dollars, that people would pay it. It charges a Lot faster than the susposed 16 hours they say. It has the finominal tripple-blade cutting system, leaves no irration. It even comes with a cleaning brush, a convient travel case, a small and sleek charging unit, perfect for travel, and the most important part, the replacement razor units are very cheap (I've seen them under 8 dollars at WalMart) and their extremly easy to install. I think you will love this razor as much as I did, and If your looking into a Norelco-System, I think you should start your looking right here. Hope this helps.

After five years, it was time to ditch my old norelco... it pulled when I went too long without shaving, took about 10 passes to cut everything, and didn't hold much charge as a cordless...
Tried to buy a more expensive razor, it was out of stock, so I got this one.  I was really surprised at first how little irritation there was.  My old Norelco was giving a bit of irriatation in places, but no problems with this one, even though it was a new razor.  First time I used it was on 6-days growth, and there was none of the painful pulling I was used to.  To top it off, the shave was so much closer.  I really have no complaints about this razor... I'm very impressed with the improvements made, and don't really see a reason to get the $100+ shavers...
With the Norelco guarentee on top of the performance, I'll be sticking with their products for another 5 years...
I am a long time user of Norelco Shavers but I would like a a light or similar warning  to deshow  the ideal time to recharge the battery.

reviewText: This is the best electric razor I have ever used.  I have owned Braun and Remington before and neither shaves nearly as close as the Norelco.  The flexibility to use it either wet or dry is great and the Nivea Cool Skin lotion and gel make shaving much more comfortable.  It is also very easy to clean. WOW,

I initially had my doubts about splurging, and getting the 7735x cool skin shaver. But man was i glad i got it. Ive had it for about three days now, and ive never had a closer shave since. Even though the colour scheme is a bit akward, this shaver is definately well worth the price tag. The only thing i had against this razor was that the gel that came with it created some irritation, but the lotion is definately much better, and you can feel the difference when you use the lotion. But all in all, I have never had a better shaver than this. i expect to keep this for a long time. THANK YOU NORELCO.
