reviewText:
terribly underpowered, cant compare to cheaper versions; with my other norelco and also remington r835, sgaving takes 1/4 the time with much closer shave
very disappointing, since ive used norelco and remingtom shavers like this one for 40 years

I've have used 2 previous Norelco shavers over the past 20 years. I tried the new Braun shaver about 2 years ago but I didn't like it very much. It pulled my beard and the foil broke after only a short period of use. I replaced the foil and blades for 40.00 (what a rip off)but I kept switching between my old Norelco and the Braun model. This year I decided to treat myself to the newer Norelco 8250 XL. Its fantastic. Much better than my old Norelco and outclasses my newer Braun shaver.
  However. before buying this Norelco, I decided to read some personal reviews. Most reviews were positive but there were a number of really bad ones. So I was skeptical. But I liked my old Norelco's and decided to give them another shot. I'm very glad I did.
  Frankly, I cant understand the bad reviews. The only thing I can figure is that the people who complained did not follow the manufactures recommendations before shaving. When I was in a hurry, I often shaved without washing and cleaning my face and was not at all pleased with the results. Pulling my beard, scratchy feeling and some irritation. But every time I wash and clean my face, my shave is EXCELLENT. If you follow the recommendation of washing and cleaning your face you won't be disappointed. Kudo's to Philips.
  While there are more expensive Norelco's on the market, you won't go wrong with this model. For the price, (I bought it at Macy's for $79.99 and got a 10% discount with a coupon my wife had recieved in the mail), it was a steal.
  Do yourself a big favor and buy this model or a similar Norelco model and you won't regret it.
unfortunatly I have found this product the  norelco 8240xl to compare most unfavorably with the norelco spectra 8831xl,which I consider to be  far superior to the latest, the Norelco arcitec.
description: The Norelco 8250XL Speed-XL Shaver features 50% more shaving surface for a fast close shave. The new contour following system of the Norelco 8250XL follows the contours of the face catching each hair with one stroke. The Norelco 8250XL simply rinses clean for easy maintenance. The precision cutting system features ultra thin heads with slots to shave long hairs and holes to shave the shortest stubble. Also, the super lift and cut technology of the Norelco 8250XL ensures a close shave with a dual blade system designed to lift hairs to cut comfortably below skin level. The Norelco 8250XL provides 50-55 minutes of shaving time.

It doesn't really add moisture- but my hands feel so much better because they are not stripped of everything like the anti-bacterial soaps do- Everyone should switch- I am going to get them for all my friends and family- good price on here too!

Later note- I did go get this in the liquid form and put it in my bathrooms and kitchen.  It seems to leave an odd film in my sinks- both the stainless steel and the porcelin sink in my bathroom.  It drove me nuts b/c it made the sinks look dirty.  Once I ran out I didn't buy anymore-I wished it didn't do this b/c other than that I liked it!

Love it, love it, love it! I use Dr. Bonner's soaps for everything from bath soap to complection soap & even to make laundry detergent to wash my clothes! I grate the bar soap & then chop in the food processor to break down even finer. Add 1 cup soap to 1 cup 20 Mule Team Borax to 1 cup of Arm & Hammer Washing soda. Use 3 tablespoons per load in your washer. Very inexpensive & does a great job of cleaning. Low sudsing with no phosphates so you can use in HE washers. Good for your clothes, washing machine, septic system & our environment! The lavender is my favorite scent for laundry detergent!

reviewText: Smells good. Keeps me dry. Cheaper on Amazon than the local drug store.

I like Degree products (Cool Rush/Cool Comfort), but after a bad experience with the MotionSense "Extreme" scent product, I took some time off from Degree altogether; going back to my old standbys: Brut and Old Spice. I tried a Nivea spray and that positive experience prompted me to try this Degree product (MotionSense "Overtime" scent). I'll keep my review simple:

Sweat = none.
BO = none.
Stained white t-shirts = too soon to tell.
Scent = though modern, surprisingly mild and pleasant. Buying blind, I was afraid I would smell like a snot-nosed teenager with a Fistful of Axe. Instead, I smell like an old dude using a modern scented Degree antiperspirant.

Peace.

description: Degree Men Advanced Protection Antiperspirant Deodorant - Overtime 2.7 oz with long lasting MotionSense Technology provides superior motion activated protection to give you powerful sweat and odor protection with fresh fragrance for a great way to start your day. An active life can lead to sweating and body odor. Degree Men Overtime features a masculine scent of fresh citrus fragrance and provides long-lasting sweat and odor protection even after the final buzzer. This antiperspirant deodorant's long-lasting protection will keep you free from body odor and sweat for those moments when life demands more from you. Its 48-hour protection keeps you moving, and helps you stay confident and free to live life to its fullest. Only Degree MotionSense Technology keeps you fresher with every move. Degree MotionSense Technology works like this: unique microcapsules sit on the surface of your skin. When you move, friction breaks those microcapsules and they release more fragrance. So every time you move, Advanced Protection keeps you fresh and free from odor. This powerful antiperspirant deodorant responds when you need it most so that you can stay confident without having to worry about slowing down. Degree Men Overtime Antiperspirant Deodorant is also available in a compressed Dry Spray. The more you move, the more it protects, so you can expect more from Degree Men Overtime. Degree. It wont let you down.

reviewText:
I researched gravity water filters extensively and even called the manufacturers for clarifying information. I was very impressed with response time & they answered my questions fully.
I chose Aquarain because of the design & because the housing & filters are Made in USA & because of the quality of customer service.
I received it earlier than expected, packaged exceptionally well, assembled it as per directions, direction were clearly written & easy to understand. I have been using it now for several weeks. I am extremely pleased with the Aquarain!! It works as described and the water tastes GREAT!
I HIGHLY recommend buying Aquarain gravity filter!

Great tasting water and pretty as well.  I do wish it was the copper tone in the pic though.  I have 2 now--one for the office and one for home.  It's nice to not carry bottled water around and it's even nicer to know in the event of a hurricane I'll still have access to clean water.

I love this! I use it to filter the city tap water from my kitchen faucet, which smells strongly of chlorine or something else. I still am not fond of the taste of the water that I get out of this filter because it tastes a little too soft and not crisp like purified water. It reminds me of the water from those refrigerator water filters. But, the water smells and tastes much better than the unfiltered tap water. No more chlorine smell and I don't have to lug those heavy 5 gallon bottles from the vending machines every week. The 2 filters are more than enough for my 2-person household. When my household grows I will probably add 2 more filters.
title: Aqua Rain Gravity Water Filter Model: 402 2 Filter 3 Gallon Capacity

reviewText: I have used this mouthwash to cure mouth sores and it works very well within a few days.  Just what I needed.

I seldom get mouth sores, but recently ate something way too spicy for my mouth to handle. Eating, drinking, and breathing all became very painful.  Inner sores on the sides of my mouth, on the bottom, near the throat, and all over my tongue.  Did I mention pain?
Having said that, the first few times I swigged this BURNED.  I'm guessing that's the disinfectant working though OH GAWD IT BURNED.  Directions say to swig for at least 30 seconds, and your ability to swig longer will improve if you swig 4 times a day.
What really surprised me was how the pain relief kicked in as soon as you spit out.  The longer you can swig, the more effective (generally) the pain management. This makes breathing and drinking bearable. It's all I can ask at the moment.
helps prevent recurrence

reviewText:
First this Coochy Plus shaving cream has the cutest name. This comes in a big eight ounce squeezeable tube. This works way better than my name brand shaving cream. This dose not leave my skin red, or irrratated. It left my skin really smooth. It smells amazing too, that was the first thing I noticed. It has a conditioner like feel to it so it is soft and fluffy and not graniy. It spreads very easily and evenly compared to having clumps of foam on your skin. The after effect are way better than I had expected, my skin was completely smooth and soft like a baby. I like it so much I have changed my shavig cream. I recommend this to any woman or man that is looking for smoother skin after a shave. I also use this for my legs and under arms with the same results. I truly love this product.

I received this item free in exchange for my honest and unbiased opinion.

This product was received for free or discount in exchange for an honest and unbiased review. I have incredibly sensitive skin and am very selective with unknown brands because I could easily (and often) break out with hives or an ugly rash. So far in using this product, neither has happened! I have noticed that my skin is softer and has not attained the redness that usually lingers with other shaving products. And unlike some other lotions, creams, etc that I have tried in the past this doesnt gunk up my razor! Thats a small victory already, because now my regular razor lasts longer when using this easily, rinse- able product. Swimsuit season is on the horizon, and this shave cream will definitely come to your rescue.

I have to admit when I was first asked to try this I said no just because of the name, I'm wondering now when I became a prude. I mentioned this to a couple of friends and they said, "you have to try it, it's amazing". I responded to peer pressure and here I am writing a review for something called Coochy Plus. :-)

First, the tube is huge, you get a lot more than I anticipated. When I tried it the first thing I noticed is the scent, at first I have to admit that I didn't like it but I think it is because I'm not use to scented items, Typically when I shave I use Dove soap followed by Bikini Zone which has been a perfectly fine combination but this does a much better job. When I was done shaving I actually liked the scent so that was no longer an issue.

The biggest difference just in initial use between this and shaving cream and soap is that there is no lather which took me a bit to get use to. I felt like I had to use a lot of it but again, that could be because I am not use to this product.

When I was done shaving my skin was noticeably smoother than using any other product I've used in the past. Even in my video review I put it on the back of my hand and when I wiped it off I noticed my hand was super soft. My shave seemed to last at least a day longer than usual if not longer which is obviously a good thing. I didn't notice any bumps or irritation, also a good thing, and I have fairly sensitive skin which includes eczema and I didn't have any issue there either.

I will admit that this is still going to take some getting use to on my part and I'm interested to see how quickly I go through the tube but for now I really like the product. I do want to say that you need to make a point to double check the ingredients to make sure you are not allergic to anything that is in it (I show them on the video part of my review) but there are a lot of natural ingredients and my sensitive skin did fine.

I do believe this is going to be a to each his (her) own product but for now I'm impressed, if I could just get past the name. :-)

I received this complimentary product for my honest and unbiased review.
description: Like most women, you have probably run into your fair share of snags, cuts, and bumps while shaving. These can lead to discomfort and tend to leave behind unsightly marks. IntiMD COOCHY PLUS Intimate Shave Cream aims to eliminate the discomforts associated with shaving of sensitive and intimate areas by developing extra-strength MOISTURIZING+ agents to effectively improve the intimate shaving experience. The powerful moisturizers help soften the skin and hair, requiring less pressure from the razor, while also reducing irritation and the occurrence of snags.   Along with extremely effective moisturizing and softening properties of Jojoba Seed Oil, Avocado Oil, Shea Butter and Aloe Vera, IntiMD utilizes the Maca Root to provide extra benefits specific to the needs of a woman. This trait also helps the body correctly distribute nutrients, relieving many menstrual symptoms. A great added bonus of this amazing root is its potent aphrodisiacal qualities, known to increase libido as well as alleviate stress-related sexual dysfunction.
title: IntiMD COOCHY PLUS Intimate Shave Cream Gel Rash-Free With MOISTURIZING+ 8oz Squeeze Bottle

description: The Andis Elevate Tourmaline Ionic Nano-Ceramic Hyper DC Hair Dryer provides 1800 watts of drying power. Crushed from precious gemstones, the tourmaline crystals emit negative ions that quickly seal the cuticle layer and eliminate frizz for smoother, silkier hair. Ionic technology dries hair faster by breaking up water molecules. Nano-Ceramic, with its smooth finish, minimizes friction and delivers far-infrared heat. reviewText: First, let me say that the stock photo of the red bottle is not the correct photo for this item. It is a white bottle with aqua and light brown lettering. I have tried many shampoos from store brands to pricey brands. The latest was Pureology Nanoworks. I read endless reviews about it so gave it a try. I didn't like it at all. It made my hair and scalp super greasy so I still have most of it left. Then I tried this one (the regular Soy Milk Shampoo, NOT the Soy Milk Moisture Shampoo) and my hair is finally balanced. I can wash my hair every other day without getting oily and it keeps my hair hydrated. It does not make my scalp itchy at all. I have severe allergies to various foods, products, pollen, you name it and this works great for me. I LOVE IT!

I'm someone who is allergic to seemingly everything. And I've had bad luck with various and sundry shampoos and conditioners that are supposedly "professional," "all natural," and the like. So I'm not discounting the other reviewer who had lousy luck with this product. But I did want to say that this shampoo (along with the corresponding conditioner) works really, really well for me. My hair happens to be quite thick and extremely prone to frizziness. Think Gilda Radner on a humid day. Plus it's color-treated. These products keep it under control.

That said.... The way I learned about this particular product was through my stylist. I've since been buying it on Amazon because it's cheaper. :-) IMHO the place to get advice as to what you should and should not put on your head is at your local, trusted salon.

I cant even start to explain how horrible this shampoo is, they are lying by saying its completely natural (it has ingredients that are proven to irriate the scalp: sodium laureth sulfate, methylchloroisothiazolinone, methylparaben) it is also a lie that its good for your hair my scalp has been itching like mad ever since i started using this. i have a very sensitive scalp so its hard to find a shampoo that doesn't hurt it, if this is really natural it shouldn't  be hurting my scalp, but that's not all, because it could just be that im allergic to something in it, it also made my hair dry and i lost a lot of shine. i won't suggest alternatives, because i tend to disregard posts that tell people to buy other products, because it could be self advertisement, but i will say that you should research the ingredients that aren't good for your hair and scalp.
description: Soy Milk
title: Sexy Hair Concepts Sexy Hair Healthy Sexy Hair Soymilk Shampoo for Dry; Color Treated Hair, 33.8 Ounce

The Baubax travel jacket is the most funded clothing project in the history of crowdfunding.                           15 features for all of your travel needs 
BauBax has solved all your traveler needs by including features that have been missing from other jackets in the past. The most economical and efficiently designed travel jacket on the market today. All BauBax jackets have a built-in inflatable neck pillow that hidden within the hood of the jacket. Innovative pillow valve technology allows a 2 SECOND INFLATION and a ONE PRESS DEFLATION. They also come with an eye mask, built-in gloves, earphone holders, neoprene lined Koozie drink pocket, a 10-inch tablet pocket, a water resistant smartphone pocket, a sunglass holder pocket with a built-in microfiber cloth for cleaning lenses, a passport pocket that accommodates all passport sizes, a zipper which is a telescopic pen and a stylus and two fleece lined hand warming pockets.
No matter the occasion, Baubax has you covered. Need a light windbreaker or something more formal for that business meeting? Baubax jackets are available in 4 styles: sweatshirts, windbreakers, bombers, and blazers. All 4 styles are offered in a variety of colors and sizes as well.
"The swiss-army knife of travel wear" - CNN Money Regardless the time of year, the BauBax jacket is your perfect travel tool.
We have identified and secured the best quality fabric manufacturers who are suppliers to the world's top apparel brands.
From coast to coast, short or long distance, school or work, we have a jacket style that will fit your needs.
What started out as a necessity for one person, turned into one of the most successful crowdfunding projects to date. This was the million-dollar idea of Yoganshi Shah and Hiral Sanghavi. Eventually their goal is to incorporate their background of electronics and software to create smart apparel!
Convenience on the go. That is what Yoganshi Shah thought of when her husband, Hiral Sanghavi, kept forgetting his neck pillow when he travelled. Initially together they thought maybe an app would work to keep a working packing list. Yoganshi had a brilliant idea of creating a jacket that essentially embodies everything has a place, and everything in its place. The outcome was a functional jacket designed for accessibility and comfort. The BauBax jacket has 15 features that helps all travelers and people on-the-go stay organized with pockets for a tablet, smart phones, sunglasses, and even a drink pocket. To add to the overall functionality, there is space to hold earphones, built-in eye mask, gloves that extend from the sleeves, and comes with a microfiber cloth to keep all eyewear sparkly clear. Of course it has the built-in neck pillow that will not be left at home again.
You likely never heard of a travel jacket before Baubax, but it's the jacket you always needed but never existed.
It is good to have clothing that solves problems you face in your day-to-day life. We are happy that Baubax is doing that for tens of thousands of customers worldwide.

reviewText:
This is probably one of the last few gel-type body washes for guys out there (Old Spice used to carry one, but did away with it recently).  I prefer the body washes like this over the straight-up liquid washes since a smaller amount of this type of wash goes a much longer way to lathering up and cleaning yourself.

I've been using this wash for at least 2 years now, it's getting harder and harder to find it in regular stores around town; almost everything is becoming that crappy liquid-style body wash that takes half the damn bottle per shower to get the same lathering power as a little teaspoon of this awesome Gillette wash.

I have no idea what the heck the other two reviewers here have been using, but this wash is great if you use it in a washcloth or shower ball / loofah.  It's not greasy whatsoever, cleans dirt and grime just fine, and the other guy must have the most sensitive grout ever in his shower to have this product stain it.

This Gillette Odor Shield body wash does not clean very well.  It also does not moisturize very well either.  The smell is also among the worst body washes I've ever used.  I can't say that it really shielded odors either, but I am usually not that smelly.

In sum, it just works and feels like a really cheap body wash with an unattractive smell.  Personally, I wouldn't pay more than a dollar for it.  I would rather buy bargain -bin Rain Dance or Suave shampoo (and use as a head-to-toe body wash) which you can typically get for a buck and smells better.

For the price, there are much better products out there like Axe shower gel.  The Snake Peel (exfoliating scrub) and Phoenix are particularly good and smell awesome.

I found this to be really yucky.  It just doesn't clean dirt or oil or pretty much anything off.  It feels like I am smearing a layer of blobs of cream around on my body.  It leaves an oily/waxy layer, but it cleans nothing.  It's not "hydrating" -- just greasy-feeling.

I guess this might possibly be OK if you had severely dry/cracked skin and don't want any cleaning whatsoever.  However, there are better products out there that I would use in that case such as a gentle baby product.

It does have a strong, manly scent but that is about all I can say good about this Gillete Dry Skin Hydrator Body Wash.
description:
Say goodbye to dry skin with Gillette Hydrator + Body Wash for Dry Skin. Patented dual phase technology cleans your skin, while hydrating agents replenish and enhance your skin's natural moisture. Unleash the power of your shower to fight dry skin.
      view larger

Why should I use Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin?Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin contains 3X the hydrators* of the leading male body wash. So it helps prevent dry skin with thick lather that cleans without drying.
How does Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin work?Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin is a dual phase technology that keeps cleansers and 3X hydrators* separate in the bottle. When you squeeze the bottle, the cleansers and hydrators combine and activate, forming a rich lather that cleans your skin. So you continue to feel great long after you finish showering.
Why does Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin look different than other products?Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin looks different because of the dual phase technology that keeps the cleansers (white) and hydrators (blue) separate. When you squeeze the bottle they combine and activate, giving you a clean all over feeling while moisturizing your dry skin.
Should I still use a moisturizing lotion with Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin?In addition to Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin, you can still use a moisturizing lotion. However, you might notice that you no longer need it.
Should I only use Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin if I have dry skin?No. Gillette Hydrator Body Wash For Dry Skin is an ideal choice for anyone wanting a great clean and hydration.
* Vs. the leading male body wash.

reviewText: Everyone should use a moisturizing lotion with SPF on their face and neck! This is wonderfuly light on my skin. Makeup applies well over this. The scent is a very nice light/creamy citrus. I feel good about using organic products on my face. I'm tired of all the synthetic stuff out there!
At first it stung a little, but after using for a few days it seemed to have gotten better

I was looking for an organic face cream that also had spf 15.  When I saw this, I bought it even though I figured it would make me break out, because most face lotions do.  I decided to give it a chance anyway.  The cream is a little heavier than most, and my skin is oily, so this was also a red flag for me.  But I was wrong!  The cream absorbs quickly and is moisturizing, yet does not make me break out.  In fact, I believe that it has helped clear my skin.  This is an excellent cream, and not something to pass up.

This particular seller is Mother Nature, shipping is free after $25, so I enjoy buying from this seller.  Other products that I use with this lotion is:  Dessert Essence face wash, Nelson's acne gel and Home Health Acne lotion (it's more like a toner).  You can get them all from Mother Nature.
description: It's in our name: Avalon Organics. Our dedication to these ideals is summarized in our pledge,Consciousness in Cosmetics: To honor our bodies and the world we live in by creating an extraordinary range of truly effective personal care products that are inherently pure, safe and certified to the Standard for Personal Care Products Containing Organic Ingredients. Each of our products is made with organic ingredients, including botanicals, extracts and essential oils. We honor ourselves, our planet and our users with the Consciousness in Cosmetics promise. We urge you to take time to honor yourself every day.
title: Avalon Organics Vitamin C Renewal Moisture Plus Lotion SPF 15 -- 4 fl oz

reviewText: I have a lot of sinus issues and this does help when my head is stuffed up!
Not worth $18.00.... but I did use it one night and felt better the next day....not sure that this roll-on is why, or just got some much needed rest. I wouldn't buy it again.
Wonderful scent but doesn't last long.

reviewText:
Amber light therapy is also sometimes referred to as yellow or orange light therapy. It encompasses the range of wavelengths from 570 nm to 620 nm.

How Does It Work & What Is It Good For:
Amber light has quite a shallow skin penetration but is effective in the treatment of skin issues involving redness, such as spider veins. Though it is not typically used for tissue healing or collagen/elastin production, where it excels is in the treatment of problems such as sun damage. It is often considered to be an ideal therapy for sensitive skin, as its therapy is calming and soothing. Amber light therapy is frequently recommended as a drug free alternative treatment for skin redness and flushing, irritation, rosacea, UV radiation damage, and reducing the appearance of the tiny blood vessels on the nose and face. It helps to flush waste from the skin, boost lymphatic flow, and increase cellular growth. Orange light returns a vitality to skin that has lost its sheen. Especially recommended for wedding days and portraits, orange light works on dull complexions to bring out a brilliant healthy glow.

How Often Should I Use It:
4 to 6 times a week for the first 2 to 3 weeks, then at least 3 times a week for at least 3 months. The more and longer you use it the better results you will get.

Benefits of amber light:
Improvements you can see  amber light therapy reduces redness, evens out the complexion and calms irritated skin. When used regularly, this means visible, ongoing benefits for many rosacea sufferers.
Benefits that start working fast  no rosacea treatment is immediate, but many users of amber light therapy for rosacea find that this treatment works faster and more consistently than most other products they have ever tried.
Quick and easy treatments  treating the entire face can be as fast as 4.5 minutes per day.
Side effect-free  when LED amber light therapy is used according to the product directions, there are no known side effects linked to its regular use.
Portable  both the bulb and the clamp light (sold separately) are light, small and durable so that you won't have to skip out on treatments just because you won't be at home. Toss them in a tote, suitcase or even a decent-sized handbag. The bulb when used according to the directions, should last a lifetime! This purchase is the only investment youll ever need to make into amber light therapy for rosacea.

I purchased this bulb, along with the red and green ones for my mobile Aesthetician business. I enjoy the flexibility if use with these bulbs and they really assist my clients with skin issues. It would be a very cost efficient way to get the spa benefits at home in comparison to other methods, but it does take longer than a panel of lights would.
great color  and  well made,  wishing for a larger  model  soon  Peter G
description: The RubyLux Amber Yellow LED Bulb is comprised of 38 premium intensity light emitting diodes (LED's) operating in the range of 570nm to 590nm. This bulb is approximately 1.75 inches in diameter and 2.5 inches tall, making it fit easily into most lamps or light fixtures. What makes the RubyLux unique is that it is engineered as a bulb to fit into virtually any US lamp or light socket. RubyLux Amber Yellow LED Bulb is the best option on the market, utilizing superior engineering and manufacturing methods to bring you the most effective technology at the lowest possible price. Instructions and safety information are delivered electronically after purchase and are also included with the product. This bulb is 120V and is intended for use in the US, Canada and other countries with 110-120V power systems. Package includes one (1) bulb only. All other items, such as RubyLux Bulb Cover Shields and RubyLux Basic Goggles are sold separately.
title: RubyLux Amber Yellow LED Bulb Size Small
